metadata.Title: CVE-2021-33587 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The css-what package 4.0.0 through 5.0.0 for Node.js does not ensure that attribute parsing has Linear Time Complexity relative to the size of the input.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-33587` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

node-css-what - 2.1.0-1+deb10u1build0.18.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: node-css-what package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.1.0-1+deb10u1build0.18.04.1').
